import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import "../styles/style.scss" import Link from 'next/link' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useRouter } from 'next/router'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' const Layout = (props) => { const router = useRouter(); const [search, setSearch] = useState(router.query.slug || ''); const handleChange = (e) =>{ setSearch(e.target.value) } return(
Search
handleChange(e)} type="text" />
Search
{ props.children }
) } export default Layout
